qas.question: How many seasons out of the last 114 has Everton been in England's top tier?
How many other teams have played all 22 seasons in the Premier League since its inception?
When was the Premier League established?
What match has been played the most since the inception of the Premier League?
How many games has Everton played against Aston Villa?
How many seasons of football has Chelsea played?
How many games has Arsenal played against Everton?
In what year was Chelsea's football team established?
In what year did Everton play its first game against Aston Villa?
How many seasons has Liverpool played?

context: Everton hold the record for the most seasons in England's top tier (Division One/Premier League), at <a0_0><b5_0><b9_0>111<b9_0/><b5_0/><a0_0/> seasons out of 114 as of 2014–15 (the club played in Division 2 in <b7_0><b8_0>1930<b8_0/><b7_0/>–31 and from 1951–54). They are one of <a1_0>seven<a1_0/> teams to have played all 22 seasons of the Premier League since its inception in August <a2_0>1992<a2_0/> – the others being Arsenal, Aston Villa, Chelsea, Liverpool, Manchester United, and Tottenham Hotspur. <a3_0>Everton against Aston Villa<a3_0/> is the most played fixture in England's top flight, as of the 2012–13 season the two founder members of the Football League have played a record <a4_0><b6_0>196<b6_0/><a4_0/> league games.
